subject_information.address: 230 Tiffany Mountain Suite 863, South Michael, KY 25205

suspicious_activity.narrative: Customer CUST_0062, an operational investment banker, exhibited a pattern of high-value transactions and multiple outgoing wire transfers totaling $380,633.78 from Feb-Aug 2025, with no outflows. This aligns with structuring activities under the Bank Secrecy Act. Suspicious activity involves potential money laundering through structuring to evade regulatory thresholds.
